name: 🤖 Robot Runner
description:
Robot  Runner is a 3D Platformer based around speed and performing skips to get the better time. The game features hidden buttons in every level that make the second half of the stage much harder, but in return it saves a lot of time. This Game was made in 7 days for the JTA Game Jam

Controls :

WASD : Walk

Sprint : Run

Space : Jump

Left Click : Activate buttons

Holding Tab : Returns the player to the Menu

O : Increases Mouse Sensitivity

P : Decreases Mouse Sensitivity

All the button skips can be found in a You Tube video made by myself (SPOILERS):
